attributes.action: restore tax concessions for employers private medical insurance for pensioners to the 'concessionary' list .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This was a concession until April 2006 at which point it was removed from the concessionary list without being mentioned in the budget! It is now stated to be up for 'consultation'. Addd your name to increase the pressure for the return of this relatively small concession ( in Treasury terms)
